section.p: Huge guns boom in the black battlefield that the sky has become. The sailors go white with fear. ‘It’s no mere storm,’ screeches the bosun. ‘It’s the final battle of the gods! It’s Armageddon!’

p.if: If you have the blessing of Alvir and Valmir, which confers Safety from Storms, you can ignore the storm. Cross off your blessing and .
